explanation: [0-0] A young man in a black jacket and white sweatpants is holding a mobile phone with a picture of a wolf on it. He opens his mouth and widens his eyes, imitating the wolf in the picture. Behind him is a tall forest.

[0-4] The camera zooms in on the man raising his index finger in front of his mouth, making a silent gesture. He then steps back, and the scene switches to a man with a beard and a black beanie sitting at a picnic table in the same forest. He looks down at his phone and whistles, his wallet and car keys on the table beside him. The scene switches back to the young man in the black jacket, squatting by a tree, holding the phone with the wolf picture on the ground.

[4-11] Then the man in the black hat is startled by the sound of a wolf howling. He looks up from his phone and stands up from the picnic table, looking around in shock and confusion. The scene cuts to the man in the black jacket, half-squatting and sticking out his tongue, holding onto a large tree. The scene then cuts back to the man in the black hat, who is squatting on the ground, walking slowly as if he is looking for something he has lost. He holds a stick in one hand. The scene cuts back to the man in the black jacket, who runs to the table and grabs the keys from the table.
